First Look at Nooku Content

15 May 2008 by Johan

</a>Here’s a first look at Nooku Contentin action.  This video example shows Nooku Content in action (front and backend) on our very own www.nooku.org website.

You can also download a higher-quality Quicktime version here (Quicktime required). We will be providing more comprehensive video tutorials of Nooku Content in action in future buzz features.  Click the read more to see the video.

http://media.libsyn.com/media/joomlajuice/nooku-750×438.mov

If you want high-definition fullscreen flash, click here.
